snippet: The NSO Group sells expensive surveillance tools for criminal and terrorism inquiries, but critics say they are also used to track journalists and rights activists....
abstract: Dozens of companies like NSO Group sell surveillance tools that can capture every activity on smartphone, including owner's personal contacts and location; secretive digital surveillance industry is quietly but aggressively marketing such spyware to governments and law enforcement agencies worldwide.
lead_paragraph: The NSO Group sells expensive surveillance tools for criminal and terrorism inquiries, but critics say they are also used to track journalists and rights activists.

headline.main: How Spy Tech Firms Let Governments See Everything on a Smartphone
headline.print_headline: Phone Spying Is Made Easy. Choose a Plan.
